author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r40025, read a pointer to the parent pointer
from a pool before destroying the pool, instead of after destroying

author: hwright
msg: Remove the knowledge about whether or not a process has locked a directory
from the access baton, and put it in the wc_db pdh.  This allows functions
writing directly to wc_db to determine whether or not they have a write lock
(adm_access_alloc): Don't allocate the locked member of the baton.
Use wc_db to determine our locked status.
(svn_wc__db_temp_forget_directory): Unlock the working copy before forgetting
(svn_wc__db_wclock_remove): After we remove the physical lock, make sure
we no longer think we own the lock.

author: hwright
msg: Remove another now-unused internal function, folding it into the public version.

author: hwright
msg: Get rid of an intermediate function call by querying wc_db directly.
(assemble_status): Just ask wc_db about the locked status of an item.

author: stsp
msg: (close_file): Stop using svn_wc_entry_t and get desired information
